Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 1 -- 6 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 6 mills property tax renewal for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities, vehicles and equipment in and for Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of West Feliciana, including vehicles and equipment for emergency service.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six (6) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $1,543,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities, vehicles and equipment in and for the District, including vehicles and equipment for emergency service as authorized by law?
